content:
Autumn has come early at Aldi

SPOOKY SEASON Make your home smell like freshly baked pumpkin pie with Aldi’s new cosy buy

HALLOWEEN may be months away, but Aldi is starting celebrations early, with its new home fragrance range.

From cosy woodland walks to film nights by the fire, autumn is one of the loveliest times of year.

And if you're excited for the scorching heat and school summer holidays to be behind you, Aldi's upcoming Specialbuys will be right up your street.

From beauty dupes to garden gadgets, the German discounter is constantly wowing shoppers with it's bi-weekly offers.

And landing in stores on August 17th, the bargain retailer's cosy candles will not disappoint.

"Get your home ready for autumn with our luxury seasonal scents at relaxing Aldi prices."

Autumn lovers will fall head over heels for the £4.99 Pumpkin Candle, which is shaped like an adorable tiny pumpkin.

You can choose from three scents: Acorns & Oak, Apple Orchard Farm or Pecan and Cinnamon Waffle, and the candle burns for 43 hours.

Also available are a rage of luxe looking Autumn Candles, with gorgeous autumn scenes painted on them, for just £3.99.

Available scents include Vanilla Pumpkin, Pumpkin Spice and Fallen Leaves, and the burn time is approximately 49 hours.

If the smaller candles aren't enough, you can also snap up an enormous two-wick candle for £19.99.

The Hotel Collection Hurricane Candle comes in two scents, Fallen leaves and Pumpkin Spice, and has a burn time of a whopping 140 hours.

If candles aren't your thing, you could try out the Wooden Lid Reed Diffuser, which is priced at £3.99.

It will make your home smell delightful for up to eight weeks and comes in three scents, Pecan & Cinnamon Waffle, Pumpkin Spice and Fallen Leaves.

The budget store is also selling an Autumn Reed Diffuser, which is patterned with falling leaves and tiny pumpkins.

You can choose either Pumpkin Spice, Fallen Leaves of Vanilla Pumpkin, and it should last you approximately seven weeks.

If you can't wait until August 17th to nab the candles, here's a taste of what landed in Aldi today.

The Powerbank 3 in 1 allows you to charge up to three items at one time, making it a must-have for any last minute summer camping trips or festivals.

Among the other gadgets to hit stores this week are bluetooth speakers, alarm clocks and headphones - each retailing for £11.99.

Available in blue, purple, or green you can choose between a host of Pantone gadgets that won't break the bank this week.

Compared to Sony's WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones that are being sold at John Lewis and Argos for £34.99 - these are a steal!
summary: Aldi has launched a new home fragrance range, with a £4.99 Pumpkin Candle and £19.99 Hotel Collection Hurricane Candle, priced at £3.99. Also available are Autumn Candles with gorgeous autumn scenes painted on them. The store's Autumn Reed Diffuser is patterned with falling leaves and tiny pumpkins. Other exciting items include bluetooth speakers, alarm clocks and headphones for £11.99 each.
shortSummary: Aldi's new home fragrance range, featuring luxury Autumn Candles, Powerbanks 3 in 1, and various other gadgets, launches on August 17 to celebrate autumn.

argos_summary: Aldi is launching a new home fragrance range ahead of autumn, featuring cozy candles and reed diffusers available starting August 17th. The collection includes a £4.99 Pumpkin Candle with various scents, larger two-wick candles for £19.99, and reed diffusers priced at £3.99. Additionally, Aldi is offering a selection of gadgets and beauty products in its bi-weekly Specialbuys, appealing to shoppers looking for budget-friendly seasonal items.
